name: reaparr
description: Reaparr is a self-hosted automation dashboard for managing Pirate streaming tools like Sonarr and Radarr. It features status overviews, control tools, and link management.

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor status and health of Sonarr, Radarr, and related services from one interface

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Organize and access all your media automation tools through a centralized hub

features.title: Data Import
features.description: See recent downloads, imports, and system events across all connected services

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Query multiple indexers and services simultaneously from a single search box

features.title: Calendar Aggregation
features.description: View upcoming releases from both Sonarr and Radarr in one unified calendar

features.title: Queue Management
features.description: Monitor and control download queues across all connected clients
